name: Alma Linux VM
long_description: This template deploys a QEMU/KVM virtual machine. It's recommended to use Macvlan for networking. You can access a VM's VNC interface by opening its IP address on port 8006.
cmds: docker run -d --name ${name} --network ${network} ${extra_params} --ip ${ip} --device=/dev/kvm --device=/dev/net/tun --cap-add NET_ADMIN -v ${name}-data:/storage --stop-timeout 120 -e BOOT=rocky -e RAM_SIZE=${ram_size_gbs}G -e CPU_CORES=${vcpus} -e DISK_SIZE=${disk_size_gbs}G --restart unless-stopped qemux/qemu
